00013 VLNVGenerator::VLNVGenerator(QWidget* parent): QGroupBox(parent),
00014 vendorEdit_(0), libraryEdit_(0), nameEdit_(0), versionEdit_(0) {
00015 
00016         // set title for the group box
00017         setTitle(tr("VLNV"));
00018 
00019         // set up the layout for the widget
00020         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00021 
00022         QLabel* vendorLabel = new QLabel(tr("Vendor:"), this);
00023         layout->addWidget(vendorLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00024 
00025         vendorEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00026         layout->addWidget(vendorEdit_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00027 
00028         QLabel* libraryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Library:"), this);
00029         layout->addWidget(libraryLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00030 
00031         libraryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00032         layout->addWidget(libraryEdit_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00033 
00034         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00035         layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00036 
00037         nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00038         layout->addWidget(nameEdit_, 2, 1, 1, 1);
00039 
00040         QLabel* versionLabel = new QLabel(tr("Version:"), this);
00041         layout->addWidget(versionLabel, 3, 0, 1, 1);
00042 
00043         versionEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00044         layout->addWidget(versionEdit_, 3, 1, 1, 1);
00045 
00046         // connect the signals informing of changes in items
00047         connect(vendorEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00048                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049         connect(libraryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00050                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051         connect(nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00052                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053         connect(versionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00054                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055 }

00060 VLNV* VLNVGenerator::getVLNV(VLNV::IPXactType type) {
00061 
00062         if (!isValid()) {
00063                 return 0;
00064         }
00065 
00066         return new VLNV(type,
00067                         vendorEdit_->text(),
00068                         libraryEdit_->text(),
00069                         nameEdit_->text(),
00070                         versionEdit_->text());
00071 }
00072 
00073 bool VLNVGenerator::isValid() {
00074 
00075         // all elements must contains text
00076         if (vendorEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00077                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Vendor-field in "
00078                                 "VLNV can not be empty"));
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081         else if (libraryEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00082                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Library-field in "
00083                                 "VLNV can not be empty"));
00084                 return false;
00085         }
00086 
00087         else if (nameEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00088                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Name-field in "
00089                                 "VLNV can not be empty"));
00090                 return false;
00091         }
00092 
00093         else if (versionEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00094                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Version-field in "
00095                                 "VLNV can not be empty"));
00096                 return false;
00097         }
00098         // everything was fine
00099         else {
00100                 return true;
00101         }
00102 }

00104 void VLNVGenerator::setVLNV(const VLNV* vlnv) {
00105 
00106         if (!vlnv) {
00107                 return;
00108         }
00109 
00110         vendorEdit_->setText(vlnv->getVendor());
00111         libraryEdit_->setText(vlnv->getLibrary());
00112         nameEdit_->setText(vlnv->getName());
00113         versionEdit_->setText(vlnv->getVersion());
00114 }

00116 void VLNVGenerator::setVLNV( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
